text: Brickland MRT station (NS3A) is a future Mass Rapid Transit station on the North South line in Choa Chu Kang, Singapore. ==History== The station was first announced on 25 May 2019 as part of the Land Transport Authority's (LTA) Land Transport Master Plan 2040. ==References== ==Related pages== *Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Brickland MRT station
